description: This file defines Angular services for managing questions and answers, providing methods for listing, creating, and retrieving questions and answers via HTTP calls to a REST API.

classes.name: QuestionsService
classes.description: Angular service for handling question-related operations such as listing, creating, and retrieving questions.

classes.name: AnswersService
classes.description: Angular service for handling answer-related operations such as listing answers, generating answers, and fetching answers for specific questions.

methods.name: listQuestions
methods.description: Fetches a list of questions ordered newest first.

methods.name: createQuestion
methods.description: Creates a new question, with authentication required.

methods.name: getQuestion
methods.description: Retrieves a single question by its ID.

methods.name: generateAnswer
methods.description: Generates or creates an answer for a question.

methods.name: listAnswersForQuestion
methods.description: Lists all answers associated with a specific question.
